Verify it becomes visible with a height animation duration of 250ms
Verify the panel's content text has font size 14px, color #495057, and internal padding 20px
Verify its border-bottom is 1px solid #E0E0E0
Open the date picker component
Verify the current month displayed is 'December 2023'
Confirm the 'Next Month' arrow button is enabled and has right margin 5px
Ensure the 25th of the month is selected, indicated by background color #007BFF and text color #FFFFFF
Verify the date picker has border radius 4px
Interact with the tabbed interface
Verify the 'Overview' tab is active with background color #007BFF and font color #FFFFFF
Confirm the 'Specifications' tab is inactive, has background color #E9ECEF, font color #6C757D, and top padding 12px

Confirm the hero banner section has background image source 'hero_background.jpg' and is fully loaded
Verify the main headline 'Discover Your Next Adventure' is visible, has font size 48px, font family 'Roboto', and text color #FFFFFF
Verify the 'Learn More' button has background color #FFC107, border radius 8px, and its text 'Learn More' centered within the button
Trigger a success notification

Monitor the download progress bar
Verify its initial value is 0%
Confirm the internal bar's width updates incrementally as the download progresses
Verify when 75% complete, the progress bar's width is 75% of the container, and its background color #007BFF
Verify the percentage text 75% is visible inside the bar with font color #FFFFFF
Click the 'Language' dropdown menu
Verify it becomes visible, displaying 3 items
Confirm the default selected item displays 'English' with font weight 700
Verify each menu item has height 36px and left padding 10px
Verify the dropdown container has border 1px solid #DDDDDD and background color #FFFFFF

Verify a tooltip becomes visible, positioned at x 200, y 150 relative to the icon
Confirm the tooltip's background color is #343A40, its text content is 'This is a helpful tip.', font size 12px, opacity 0.9, border radius 4px, and its visibility transition is 150ms
Scroll to the bottom of the page
Verify the 'Load More' button is visible, displays text 'Load More Articles', is enabled, has bottom margin 30px, and font weight 500
Click the 'Load More' button
Check that the article count increases by 10
Verify the 'Load More' button text changes to 'Loading...' during an active state, becoming disabled, and its background color changes to #007BFF
On the search results page, verify the pagination controls are visible
Confirm the 'Next' button is enabled

Verify the scroll position is at scroll-top 0

Verify each share button has margin-right 10px and opacity 0.7
Verify the overall social media sharing bar is aligned center

Verify the transition between slides is 400ms
